availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Carroll County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married Sarah Ringo. Father of Caroline Ringo, George Ringo, Jr., Sarah Ringo, James Ringo, and Joseph Ringo. Farmer in Henry County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Carroll County in 1860.

bibl.p:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, District No. 1, p. 387 B; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, District No. 2, p. 43; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules,
Kentucky, Carroll County, Prestonville, p. 2; Find A Grave, "George Ringo, Sr (1800-1881)," Memorial #28421157, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/28421157 (accessed November 17, 2016).
